pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Sleep Assist Medicinal Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sleep Assist with Sweet Orange, Lavender, Marjoram & German Chamomile essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to soothe and aid in sleep.

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30C

NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY.

KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN

Common Uses

The powerful calming properties of Sweet Orange, Lavender, Marjoram and German Chamomile essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to assist with the relief of mild insomnia, sleeplessness and the symptoms associated with nervous tension, restlessness, stress, and mild anxiety to help provide a restful night's sleep.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains essential oils from: Citrus sinensis (Sweet Orange) Fruit peel 622 µL, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender) Herb top flowering 300 µL, Origanum majorana (Sweet Marjoram) Leaves 70 µL, Matricaria chamomilla (German Chamomile) Flowers 8 µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day):

Vaporisation: Add 3-6 drops (0.2mL) to the water in your vaporiser.

Massage: Add 5 drops (0.2mL) to 10mL carrier oil and massage into chest and back. The mixture can be kept for 24 hours at room temperature.
